summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5994 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, California Heights Addition and Block 2, Seaview Heights Addition, being the alley between 41st Avenue Southwest and 142nd Avenue Southwest from West Hudson Street to West Dawson Street; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80321, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
